about


Hi, I am humberto Corona, the author of this blog. I write about  contemporary art, photography, music hacking and recommender systems.  I am a PhD student in Computer Science at the University College Dublin, working in the Insight Centre for Data Analytics. I have a twitter account @totopampin.

Other than this blog, I collaborate in The Issue magazine and Temps de Vacances magazine, both in technical issues and writing invited posts every now and then.

 

I not often look like this, but sometimes I do. When I do, it is because I am posing for a self portrait – what the mainstream media kids call selfies nowadays.
